pages.text: Herbal Sigils are used in high-tier conjurations, such as Padlocks.
Sigils are made by using a combination of herbs and a non-cracked Sigil. To create a Sigil, you will need certain herbs and a Smoothened Stone or a Cracked Sigil.
pages.title: First Sigil

pages.text: The conjuration to create a Sigil is shown above. These currently do not have many major uses, but that will change in future updates :)

Herbal Sigils can come in many forms, some of the most powerful ones being in correlation to the Princes of Sin; Envy, Gluttony, Greed, Lust, Pride, Sloth, and Wrath. Some of the other variations of Herbal Sigils include; Configuration (Non-Advanced & Advanced) and Mastery (Non-Advanced & Advanced).

This $(l:hibernalherbs:herbal_conjuration/sigil/sins/envy)Herbal Sigil$() is aligned with the Prince of Envy.$(br2)This allows you to create mystical items such as a padlock that, once bound, provides more health and speed to the user.
pages.title: Envy Alignment

pages.text: This $(l:hibernalherbs:herbal_conjuration/sigil/sins/gluttony)Herbal Sigil$() is aligned with the Prince of Gluttony,$(br2)This allows you to create mystical items such as a padlock that, once bound, provides more health and makes you immune to hunger.
pages.title: Gluttony Alignment

pages.text: This $(l:hibernalherbs:herbal_conjuration/sigil/sins/greed)Herbal Sigil$() is aligned with the Prince of Greed,$(br2)This allows you to create mystical items such as a padlock that, once bound, provides more health and makes you more lucky.
pages.title: Greed Alignment

pages.text: This $(l:hibernalherbs:herbal_conjuration/sigil/sins/lust)Herbal Sigil$() is aligned with the Prince of Lust,$(br2)This allows you to create mystical items such as a padlock that, once bound, provides more health and makes you immune to both poisoning and withering.
pages.title: Lust Alignment

pages.text: This $(l:hibernalherbs:herbal_conjuration/sigil/sins/pride)Herbal Sigil$() is aligned with the Prince of Gluttony,$(br2)This allows you to create mystical items such as a padlock that, once bound, provides more health and gives you regeneration.
pages.title: Pride Alignment

pages.text: This $(l:hibernalherbs:herbal_conjuration/sigil/sins/sloth)Herbal Sigil$() is aligned with the Prince of Greed,$(br2)This allows you to create mystical items such as a padlock that, once bound, provides more health and gives you slow falling. Be careful however, as you are slowed while this padlock is in effect.
pages.title: Sloth Alignment

pages.text: This $(l:hibernalherbs:herbal_conjuration/sigil/sins/wrath)Herbal Sigil$() is aligned with the Prince of Lust,$(br2)This allows you to create mystical items such as a padlock that, once bound, provides more health and damage to the user.
pages.title: Wrath Alignment

pages.text: While these Herbal Sigils are very powerful, there are some other variations that may be worth looking into.$(br2)The Configuration Sigils aren't currently used for anything, but is planned to change.$(br2)Mastery Sigils on the other hand are very useful!
Mastery Sigils are used to create Golden Rings, as well as Advanced Mastery Sigils.$(br2)Advanced Mastery Sigils are used to create Padlocks and the Advanced Gluttonous Ring.
Advanced Mastery Sigils, as listed prior, are used for Advanced Gluttonous Rings and Padlocks.
